t: 17:3*r The Greek word for brother*i or*i sister*i (adelphos) refers here to a fellow disciple, whether man or woman.
17:12*r The Greek word traditionally translated leprosy*i was used for various diseases affecting the skin.
17:24*r Some manuscripts do not have in*i his*i day.*i
17:36*r Some manuscripts include here words similar to Matt. 24:40.
